name: Account Creation
description: Collection of identity and contact data to open an account.

name: Transaction Processing
description: Use of personal data to execute and record transactions.

name: Marketing Communication
description: Use of contact data for direct marketing communications.

name: Analytics and Reporting
description: Use of pseudonymized or aggregated data for analytics and reporting.

name: Third-Party Sharing
description: Sharing personal data with third-party service providers.

name: Data Retention
description: Storage and archival of personal data for defined retention periods.

name: Data Deletion
description: Deletion or anonymization of personal data on expiry or request.
